Headline: #124 Navy Pier Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Jefferson/Jackson
ShortDescription: Eastbound 124 Navy Pier buses are temporarily rerouted via Clinton, Harrison, Halsted, Monroe and Canal: due to, a festival near Jefferson/Jackson.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #124 Navy Pier buses are temporarily rerouted via Clinton, Harrison, Halsted, Monroe and Canal: due to, a festival near Jefferson/Jackson.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Reroute at Michigan/Chicago.
ShortDescription: 151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via  Michigan, Chicago, Lasalle, and Stockton. due to street blockage near Michigan/Chicago.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via  Michigan, Chicago, Lasalle, and Stockton. due to street blockage near Michigan/Chicago.

 Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express and 146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express  Temporary Reroute at Michigan/Chicago
